participant_1.background:
I feel like I'm not living up to my full potential.
I'm a pretty peaceful person, but I can hold my own if I need to.
I love learning about the geology of the Grand Canyon and sharing my knowledge with visitors.
i work as a freelance accountant.
My black and white cat, Cow, is my most valued material possession because he is my best friend and always there for me.

participant_2.background:
I'm not that much into music, but I like to go to concerts with my boss.
i am pursuing my law degree.
I like to be alone, but I love my baby.
I'm afraid I'll be unable to keep up with my busy schedule.
I spend my free time with my new love, whom I love to drive around with on long winding roads.

content.text: Pretty well so far, how about yours?
It's going good. I'm trying to decide what to do with my weekend.
Oh cool, what are your options?
Well, I could go to the Grand Canyon with my black and white cat, Cow. I could also go to a concert with my boss.
Oh nice! I've always wanted to go to the Grand Canyon. What do you think it would be like to see it with your cat?
I think it would be really cool! Cow loves to go on adventures with me.
Oh yeah, I guess he would. I'm not really into music, but I like to go to concerts with my boss.
Oh really? What do you like about going to concerts with your boss?
I guess I just like the atmosphere and the energy. It's fun to be around people who are excited about the same thing you are.
Yeah, that's true. I love the energy of a concert. I'm not sure I'm going to have time to go to one this weekend though. I have a lot of work to do.
Oh, that's too bad. I hope you can make it to one soon!
